name: CleanUpCountdown
0:
”Alexa, open clean up countdown”
”Alexa, start clean up countdown”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: clean up countdown
des:
Clean up toys is important part of kids play and development! Either at school or home, once kids play on certain toys and if they plan for another game, it's always important to clean up before they move-on to the next activity. This simple clean up countdown would assist you to do a quick clean up chore! Can be used at school or home for an instant start and do the clean-up job in 30 seconds or 1 minute! 

So, want to instill the practice of clean up in kids, there is a simple solution to try! Of course, try doing a count down with Alexa by just saying, " Alexa, Open Clean Up Countdown". 

Have fun cleaning along with countdown! Kindly leave your ratings and share it with friends if you think this countdown would be helpful for them!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
